subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia, who was 14-13 with a 4.78 earned run average this year, with one more start to go, will require a recovery period of about eight weeks, the Yankees said.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia, who was 14-13 with a 4.78 earned run average this year, with one more start to go, will require a recovery period of about eight weeks, the Yankees said.
